rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0001
rows.name:
Before we leave,
I need to explain something
to Hana and Boss.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0002
rows.name: What's that?

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0003
rows.name: There's a gaming device here!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0004
rows.name:
I've been wondering about it for a
while. So it was a gaming device.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right!
It's called TIGER! TIGER!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0006
rows.name:
It's a timeless masterpiece
that Grampypon made for Tora
when he was small.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0007
rows.name: Although it looks quite beat-up...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0008
rows.name:
I've just switched it on,
so it's ready to play!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0009
rows.name:
Boss!
You should give it a try!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0010
rows.name: Hmmmm...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0011
rows.name:
I'd like to, but
I might get too absorbed in it, and
we need to go help Nia..

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0012
rows.name: No, wait, hold on!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0013
rows.name:
You can get parts to upgrade Hana
by playing this game!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0014
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0015
rows.name:
Grampypon created this game
anticipating the day we would need it.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0016
rows.name:
If you think "Hana is a bit weak!"
"Want to make her stronger!!", then get
parts here when you feel that way.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0017
rows.name:
Ah, I understand.
In that case, I'll give it one try.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0018
rows.name: That's good!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0019
rows.name: Well then, let's TIGER! TIGER!

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0020
rows.name:
Since Boss is a beginner,
let me explain how to play...

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0021
rows.name:
Use the directional pad to move.
Press A to attack.

rows.label: fev02_290_123_msg0022
rows.name:
For everything else...
Explaining would be too much trouble,
so just learn as you play!
